title: OS2 Warp4
description:
I have included installation instructions for Sun xVM VirtualBox and for a real install to hard disk. Both are easy. 
I have it up and running as a virtual machine as the xVM VirtualBox has a specific setting for OS2 Warp4. 
OS2 has a reputation for not running in virtual mode but it runs fine on the Sun xVM machine.

For people with the xVM VirtualBox you may like to try Puppy4 (a7z file). Its a torrent that is the xVM hard disk image of an installed copy of the latest version of Puppy Linux.
